metadata.title: CVE-2025-0218

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Legacy 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP5

metadata.description: When batch jobs are executed by pgAgent, a script is created in a temporary directory and then executed. In versions of pgAgent prior to 4.2.3, an insufficiently seeded random number generator is used when generating the directory name, leading to the possibility for a local attacker to pre-create the directory and thus prevent pgAgent from executing jobs, disrupting scheduled tasks.
